  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="4563" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="4563" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.76</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1069">1,069</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="125"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Quercus</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Chypre fragrance for women and men. <b>Quercus</b> was launched in 1996. The nose behind this fragrance is Christian Provenzano. Top notes are Amalfi Lemon, Lime, Bergamot and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Lily-of-the-Valley, Jasmine and Cardamom; base notes are Oakmoss, Musk, Galbanum, Sandalwood and Amber. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html" target="_blank"                             <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">14</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    May become too sweet or overripe as time passes
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-up"></i>
                                 </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">0</span></div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">17</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    May have an artificial fruity smell that some may not like
                </div>
                    </div>
    </div>
</div>

</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.98070561712475; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.39.jpg" style="width: 3.85rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Oakmoss-39.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Oakmoss</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.8594681029756; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.45.jpg" style="width: 3.075rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Galbanum-45.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Galbanum</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; </pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="4563"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='86c42a8dd373ae0a098d464dc4b2acde371' slotpayload='{"ct":"kj4irwZaHyupRorsp1leY\/VfB2C+pzZQewBZ2AIH5UM+zPSU9BYFMsLHiV3xh3xVpCvu7HudRDcG13iPakrwkCjXRfZCuRwJrESr2SmQKB+bHfdVC0rmQHMhBFGb7mfBCSsIkbT6rf4wKqsbgYRiszDk+74t2UutcLxsECtEvriIZaT8M6wHtzzk3Gz34\/X4c4qwc7cOspQQ20OLQfFNPcJVjRYsnXGyJHX\/qMVkgUVPX5E3WzEgxyWRCATAfwTL0RbrEUNDNcdQB+VaWids8SNV3TWAzBHzjKAwhWn6ivBC89l5CcyRb3dQ\/tFIJ40m","iv":"428c8f2cfca6fc1a13ff5bb31007486c","s":"f9dfd57bbf456161"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2320387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2320387" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rylai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.67827.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rylai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Her-Confession-96864.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96864.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Her Confession"title="Her Confession"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2320387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2320387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827">rylai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-18">10/18/24 23:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a very familiar scent. Reminds me of my mini hand cologne from the Covid era. It's a clean and fresh scent, but it's too common. After 15 minutes, there's no trace of the scent. True unisex.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="2320387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=2320387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2285478" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2285478" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dodo The Great"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2239426"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dodo The Great" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2285478ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2285478" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2239426">Dodo The Great</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-17">09/17/24 01:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like BBQ Sauce</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="2285478"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=2285478#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2280726" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2280726" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="austinfranklin513"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2177457"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="austinfranklin513" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2280726ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2280726" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2177457">austinfranklin513</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-12">09/12/24 14:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>got this as a sample. this is just straight up CK one. just buy that its much cheaper</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="2280726"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=2280726#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2256020" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2256020" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ersatz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1320419"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ersatz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sarah-Baker-Perfumes/Symmetry-63314.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63314.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Symmetry"title="Symmetry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2256020ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2256020" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1320419">Ersatz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-21">08/21/24 04:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There are two "danger zones" for me with fragrances: sweetness and lemon. The former is something that is more about personal tasteeven with foodbut the latter, though I love the smell and flavour of lemon, tends to do something funny on my skin after the first few hours. So, this one, a gift, sat at the back of the cabinet for some time. But this summer, maybe emboldened by woody citrus combinations I've come to love from other houses, I thought I'd pay it more attention. I'm really glad I did. For one thing, the lemon doesn't go weird and the woody oakmoss and sandalwood come out well for me. It's not groundbreaking, pretty much a Jermyn Street classic vibe, so don't bother if you're after cutting-edge. And, look away if you want your fragrance to announce your arrival, though that really would be an unreasonable in something where the word "cologne" appears on the bottle. <br />
<br />
I guess some of the very things some people don't like about itthat it's fresh and fairly "safe" and not overly powerfuland that the wood notes come through well on me, are what I do like about it. I have found a place for it: it's a good choice for serious occasions (or joyous occasions like weddings if you don't want to draw more attention than the bride and groom) or if you don't wan't to be the parent picking the kids up at a school activity who gets gossiped about for trying to seduce others. But, yes, it's definitely very expensive for what it is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="2256020"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=2256020#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2248844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2248844" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enrium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enrium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2248844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2248844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833">Enrium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 07:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Quercus is another freshie from Penhaligon's, but I like this one much less than the others I've tried so far. A fresh, citrusy EDC, it is surprisingly synthetic with a metallic undertone, something I find unforgivable in colognes, especially at this price point. The listed notes look promising, and I was keen to try this as a result, but what a let-down.<br />
<br />
Quercus opens with a lemon-led citrus accord, bright and fresh, but quickly becoming synthetic, reminiscent of washing-up liquid. The metallic quality emerges early on, bringing it firmly to harsh, synthetic territory. I get no mossy/woody chypre base, it just remains like so until it fades to nothing. Sillage is intimate and longevity is weak. It is a unisex summer daytime scent, but I can't fathom why anyone would choose this.<br />
<br />
A synthetic disappointment with limited performance, Quercus has little going for it, and is certainly overpriced. It might work well as a shower gel, but certainly doesn't translate to cologne form. Buy CK1 instead - a much better and cheaper version of this. 1/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="2248844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=2248844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.78); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239380" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lostnose2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1933834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lostnose2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239380ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239380" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1933834">lostnose2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 05:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, bright, and clean. This is a great scent with a crisp opening and enjoyable finish. The issue,  as with most of Penhaligon's fragrance offerings, lies in the poor performance. This is magnified coupled with cost. Penhaligon's does have some winners,  this one isn't it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="2239380"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=2239380#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2186088" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2186088" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fogwalker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/821659"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.821659.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fogwalker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mauboussin/Mauboussin-Pour-Lui-in-Black-30138.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30138.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mauboussin Pour Lui in Black"title="Mauboussin Pour Lui in Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2186088ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2186088" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/821659">Fogwalker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-12">06/12/24 11:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I haven't smelled this for years, so I have no idea how it smells nowadays, but this was a regular in my collection.<br />
It is a beautiful fragrance, but the sillage and longevity were shockingly poor (like many Penhaligon's perfumes tend to be).<br />
That's the main reason I stopped buying it  poor performance.<br />
I get the comparisons to CK One, which I also like, but this is infinitely superior in every way......except maybe for the weak performance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="2186088"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=2186088#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2176592" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="2176592"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=2176592#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2102555" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2102555" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DBlack47"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564641"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1564641.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DBlack47" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Sport-2021-71326.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71326.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Sport 2021"title="Dior Homme Sport 2021"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2102555ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2102555" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564641">DBlack47</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-24">03/24/24 07:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>5ml dabber bottle: Its alright, nothing special as a cologne. I was in a hotel in 2021 and the hand wash-/body wash version of this fragrance is GREAT, because its fresh, clean and soft. <br />
<br />
I definitely wont buy a full bottle of this, as it has poor sillage, poor projection and lasts only 2-3 hours. <br />
<br />
Recommendation: Miss<br />
Rating: 3.75/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="2102555"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=2102555#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2071093" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Quercus is very smooth and well-blended, and is one of the best Penhaligon perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="2071093"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=2071093#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2022634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Instead I smell soap, mint, and an aquatic smell</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="2022634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=2022634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2021075" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2021075" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cookygirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/874574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cookygirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Idole-Aura-67578.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67578.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Idle Aura"title="Idle Aura"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2021075ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2021075" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/874574">cookygirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-05">01/05/24 05:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So this really does smell like Azzaro's Chrome,<br />
Unfortunately, DH and I were not fans of that one. The neroli smelled kind of funky on DH's skin.<br />
I get that same note here on my own skin, even though neroli isn't listed.<br />
I do smell the galbanum and oakmoss - both notes that I love -  in the drydown but only when I actually sniff my arm.<br />
The scent bubble has more of a baby wipe vibe.<br />
Overall, I'm not that impressed with this scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="2021075"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=2021075#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1971694" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583026">MKnocker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-06">10/06/23 21:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very fresh and clean but performs terrible. Reminds me a lot of LV Imagination but Imagination performs way better. As I work my way through a couple Penhaligon discovery sets Im finding the same thing over and over - good or great scents with shit performance. Seems to be a theme for this house. <br />
<br />
If theyd offer the same perfumes with better performance Id be a buyer on at least a few FBs. But I cant spend $ on anything that needs a respray after 2 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1946008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1946008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1937169" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I like the citrusy smell but I don't want to pay a premium price for a perfume with poor longevity and a much cheaper replacement. I'll probably grab a FB of CK One.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1937169"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1937169#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1927882" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1927882" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Eau-de-Rochas-2361.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2361.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Rochas"title="Eau de Rochas"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1927882ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1927882" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341923">COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-14">09/14/23 12:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh I love this.  It's really well blended but I still can make out the juicy citruses floating over the white floral heart, with a gorgeous oakmoss, sandalwood, galbanum, and amber base.  The sillage is decent, and the longevity is moderate, but this is a great all-around scent.  I would enjoy this in all seasons, day or night.  Someone in the comments said it reminds them of CK One and yikes on a bike that's true, just more substantial.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1927882"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1927882#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1919739" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1919739" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sandra_101"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1674985"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1674985.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sandra_101" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Carnal-Flower-1024.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1024.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carnal Flower"title="Carnal Flower"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1919739ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1919739" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1674985">sandra_101</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-04">09/04/23 16:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This gives an aristocratic, old-school cologne vibe that kind of echoes Chanel's Paris-Edimbourg for me; not that they actually smell that similar, just the vibe. Quercus is sturdier, though. The titular oak tree is a good metaphor for this one. <br />
<br />
I'm not sure it quite reaches FB worthy but I've worn this sample from the discovery set a couple of times now and I'm really enjoying it. For context, I identify as she/her, and this definitely doesn't seem too masculine on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1919739"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1919739#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1885406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Strikes me as more of a mens cologne.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1885406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1885406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1884638" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I think it may have transported them back to school days where there was a boy they liked. It's because this scent has that jovial freshness about it, but then again it's quite simply like any other aftershave you could get, very light, very standard and it is nothing that stands out but I can see why it's a good seller.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It's poor performance and scent profile makes it pretty good for a gym scent. Lemons, woods and mosses. 1-2 hours of performance, but we can't expect more out of it. It' s a cologne after all. padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1242193">Xermona</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-14">07/14/23 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is indeed a very nice and subtle perfume. If you like the scent save yourself 100 and buy CK One.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1870769"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1870769#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1853050" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1853050" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EstanciaMercedes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472254"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1472254.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EstanciaMercedes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Tobacco-Honey-84518.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84518.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Honey"title="Tobacco Honey"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1853050ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1853050" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472254">EstanciaMercedes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-09">06/09/23 21:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pity the dismissal of this clean subtle and very classy fragrance. <br />
<br />
The comparisons to CK are useless if one's never smelled CK. It seems though that many reviewers spend their day doused in cleaning products, throwing their nose off.<br />
<br />
We both wear it in our home. The fresh citrus is delightful, not astringent, with the dry down rounder and to my nose, softly woody with notes of amber and sandalwood. An everywhere and anytime fragrance that is not found everywhere and always welcome. <br />
<br />
Penhaligon's threw in a mystery gift with the purchase, a full sized Babylon. Wow, what a contrast! Absolutely thrilled. My calculating self thought, hmm, that's half price for each.  Two great perfume investments.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1853050"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1853050#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1839410" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1839410" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="seokjean"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1533207"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1533207.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="seokjean" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nautica/Nautica-Voyage-913.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.913.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nautica Voyage"title="Nautica Voyage"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1839410ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1839410" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1533207">seokjean</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-22">05/22/23 13:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Penhaligon's Quercus is totally gnarly<br />
It's like a wave of freshness and energy that hits you right in the face <br />
The citrus notes are totally killer and give the fragrance a super-refreshing vibe n then you get hit with a smooth n chill wave of jasmine n cardamom that totally mellows you out <br />
And let's not forget about the base notes. The moss and amber give the fragrance a solid foundation that totally sets it apart from other scents</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1839410"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1839410#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1830484" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; 'll pass</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1830484"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1830484#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1810398" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1810398" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysticalArugula"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysticalArugula" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1810398ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1810398" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-16">04/16/23 14:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its a mellowed chypre version of Blenheim Bouquet It's airy citrusy just instead of of a pine dry down it is oakmoss which creates a pleasant fresh earthy soil scent. Wonderful cologne, and it's more masculine compared to unisex. I imagine a posh man who plays golf or enjoys riding. Very elegant, clean and bright for a masculine fragrance however I do have a preference over Cousin Matthew for it's more refreshing and has a greater longevity. I would use this Mercurian cologne if you need a workout fragrance that isn't overpowering and Cousin Matthew as a signature scent. Both used on a daily would be a great for someone who enjoys a certain routine and wants a good but not strong fragrance to wear in the office. <br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
Virgo  Gemini  Cancer</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1810398"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1810398#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1799459" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
