Lemony/citrusy. Totally unisex in my opinion and very green. Not much sillage at all, totally a skin scent by the end of the day. Want more sillage from penhaligons :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1799459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1799459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1790852" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1790852" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Muki Yair"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1653244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1653244.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Muki Yair" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Empressa-Eau-de-Parfum-67818.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67818.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Empressa Eau de Parfum"title="Empressa Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1790852ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1790852" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1653244">Muki Yair</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-23">03/23/23 12:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>took me a little bit of time to fall in love with this one, but now I just love it <br />
it's very fresh and citrusy  and the dry down is absolutely gorgeous earthy and mossy giving the feeling of being outdoors in nature after the winter , when it's still mossy from a lot of rain but fresh , just beautiful</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1790852"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1790852#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1786371" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1786371" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DanataDante"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1514492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1514492.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DanataDante" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nasomatto/Baraonda-40200.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40200.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Baraonda"title="Baraonda"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1786371ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1786371" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1514492">DanataDante</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-18">03/18/23 02:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>*Had to alter my review a little bit after wearing this for a day*<br />
<br />
There is something distinctly British about Penhaligons perfumes for me. Unassuming, appealingproper?<br />
Quercus has the same quality of simple, unassuming generic cologne. <br />
<br />
Initially opens with powdery, non-realistic tamed citrus, and settles into sweeter notes of some white flowers and distant sandalwood. <br />
Leans masculine. Pleasant, but barely leaves any impression. <br />
I imagine a young gentleman - early 20th century? - visiting his parents in the country. He is a nice guy, but main heroine will definitely not choose him for marriage <br />
<br />
Quercus sits close to the skin, lasts maximum of 3-4 hours. <br />
Given the generic pleasantries of the actual smell and perfumes weak performance, seems like a bad money/value combination. <br />
6.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1786371"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1786371#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1762861" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1762861" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mejohann"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/196086"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.196086.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mejohann" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lubin/Black-Jade-13013.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13013.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Jade"title="Black Jade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1762861ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1762861" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/196086">mejohann</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-17">02/17/23 22:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was so disappointed by this, with the name, I had thought this would be an oak-centered scent. But the only notes are heavy citrus and strong, cheap cedarwood. If there's any sandalwood in this, it must have been in the original formulation. Sandalwood is probably my favorite scent in the whole world and if it's here it's deep into the background, buried by all the citrus. Overall this has a pretty generic cologne scent and it leaned quite masculine on me. That's not a problem or anything, but that does mean that some men might find it to be a little too unisex or femme for their tastes. But that could just be because I grew up in a family that practically bathes all the women, young and old, in 4711, thus perceiving the combination as a little feminine. Speaking of which, it does hold a lot of similarities with 4711. The structure, top notes, and overall impression are the same. However, the drydown of this is a lot more dry and less floral and sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1762861"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1762861#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1751191" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1751191" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LauraVTerrazas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404949"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1404949.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LauraVTerrazas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Rihla-Eau-de-Parfum-66765.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66765.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Rihla Eau de Parfum"title="Eau Rihla Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1751191ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1751191" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404949">LauraVTerrazas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-03">02/03/23 18:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like overpriced old school men's deodorant.  Don't get me wrong, it smells good as a deodorant but not as a fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1751191"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1751191#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1749419" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1749419" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fleurie20"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/21613"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.21613.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fleurie20" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1749419ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1749419" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/21613">Fleurie20</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-01">02/01/23 19:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Laundry detergent scent in a bottle</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1749419"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1749419#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1721645" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1721645" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaContessina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1308645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaContessina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Barenia-96428.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96428.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Barnia"title="Barnia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1721645ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1721645" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308645">LaContessina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-31">12/31/22 08:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As much as I love Provenzano's work and as much as i respect Penhaligon's, Quercus was a total let down for me. I was expecting a strong, woody fougere (quercus means Oak in latin). That's not the case.<br />
<br />
Mind you, this frag is not bad at all: it is just a 100% matching dupe of CK One. <br />
100% less the longevity (Ck One last for days, Quercus for an hour).<br />
<br />
A freshie, pick-me-up lemon based frag with a light woody base. <br />
Genderless, very Nineties, all the story you already know. Lovely and wearable. Just way too expensive for what it is.<br />
<br />
I was so angry when I got my bottle - blind bought online cause i couldn't get hold of it where i live- only to discover a Ck One clone in a fancy, yellow bow-tie adorned bottle paid 5 times more! I was really mad.<br />
<br />
Used it up anyway because i like the scent, however DON'T waste your hard earned buck on it.<br />
<br />
PS: CK One  birth year is 1994. Quercus is 1996. Who copied who?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1721645"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1721645#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1721624" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1721624" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SmellTest"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261869"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1261869.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SmellTest" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1721624ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1721624" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261869">SmellTest</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-31">12/31/22 08:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Quercus is clearly Penhaligons answer to CK One. Virtually indistinguishable to me. If you like CK One and want a cool Penhaligons bottle, then this is for you. But the original is still doing fine, unless youre tired of it. (Im not.)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1721624"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1721624#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1686192" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1686192" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tobaksskab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1601566"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1601566.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tobaksskab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1686192ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1686192" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1601566">tobaksskab</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-11">11/11/22 12:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells of citrus. It smells clean. Maybe clean toilet even. It doesn't last. It's not memorable. I do not see the jasmine at all. Another of Penhaligon's that is as bland as British cuisine (my apologies to any Brits reading this). Not worth the investment, and what a shame, because I really love the bottles.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1686192"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1686192#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1672215" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1636057" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Grady"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538741"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1538741.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Grady" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Masque-Milano/Russian-Tea-28499.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.28499.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Russian Tea"title="Russian Tea"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1636057ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1636057" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); It's only redemption is that its a short lived fragrances. I'm disappointed with most all penhaligan's scents. The ones that are good (portraits collection) are garbage for longevity, and the bad ones are just bad.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1636057"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1636057#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1630738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1630738" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maryteresatu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1473570"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="maryteresatu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Eau-des-Merveilles-9.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau des Merveilles"title="Eau des Merveilles"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1630738ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1630738" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1473570">maryteresatu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-24">08/24/22 20:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wore this during hot summer. For a woman who live in Taiwan like me, its too manly and too western smell. This fragrance gives me a sense of a play boy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1630738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1630738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1627975" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1627975" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lykopa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492443"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1492443.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lykopa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Acqua-di-Parma/Acqua-di-Parma-Blu-Mediterraneo-Fico-di-Amalfi-1687.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1687.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Fico di Amalfi"title="Acqua di Parma Blu Mediterraneo - Fico di Amalfi"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1627975ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1627975" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492443">Lykopa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-20">08/20/22 18:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a citrus where I can smell the base notes very well, and luckily, they are nice. Quercus is perfectly named, as it smells like it sounds. Bright, crisp, smooth. This would make a great linen spray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1627975"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1627975#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1624362" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1624362" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="artfulsmeller"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158294"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="artfulsmeller" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1624362ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1624362" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1158294">artfulsmeller</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-15">08/15/22 16:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have samples of this and CK One and they are near identical as others have said. Smelling them both side by side, Quercus is soapier while CK One has more florals/green notes. Without having both of them, they are easily confused. I prefer Quercus because it smells cleaner like out-of-the-shower soapy, cooler, and lasts longer on my skin. CK One is warmer/fizzier.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1624362"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1624362#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1616940" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1616940" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BaldBoyBaris"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517379"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1517379.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BaldBoyBaris" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Whispers-in-the-Library-53537.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53537.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Whispers in the Library"title="Whispers in the Library"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1616940ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1616940" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1517379">BaldBoyBaris</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-04">08/04/22 13:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Open with a similar lime sour candy from Blenheim Bouquet, and goes to some green little white flowers and oak moss. The oak moss reminds me of tobacco wire.<br />
There are details, but can't think of a reason to buy this chypre.<br />
------<br />
Blenheim Bouquet<br />
</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1616940"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1616940#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1607091" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1607091" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rogerant"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479933"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1479933.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rogerant" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1607091ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1607091" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1479933">Rogerant</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-20">07/20/22 13:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening of this one is really bright and invigorating but it doesn't last long. In dry down you do get a little wood and a chyphre vibes. But it's a little underwhelming in all aspects. If you wear it in high heat of summer it dies project more powerfully. I live in Wales so that's about 1 day a year. Like most of penhaligons you appreciate it the more you wear it. However it's a bit pricey for what it is an the longevity really is poor for that money. I'll enjoy it while my bottle lasts, had it for a bargain but will mot be repurchasing. Stick to douro and sartorial</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1607091"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1607091#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1605291" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1580189" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RawSmells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384192"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1384192.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RawSmells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-EAUX-Primordiales/Champaca-Supercritique-49555.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49555.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Champaca Supercritique"title="Champaca Supercritique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1580189ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1580189" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1384192">RawSmells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-08">06/08/22 09:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ok in  my books, most of the signature range are the same but very different if that makes any sense? But this? Come on! Why the hate, this is just awesome, I think its overtaken Castile and  Blenheim.yes, none of them project and none of them bl**dy last and therefore they are a bit overpriced for that reason but God they are awesome, only ones I still dont have are Junipwr Slimg and Hammam Bouquet. I do want Juniper Slimg thought but this one is going to be a regular like Endymion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1580189"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1580189#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1570262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1570262" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Glyph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1312716.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Glyph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Xeryus-861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Xeryus"title="Xeryus"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1570262ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1570262" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1312716">Glyph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-24">05/24/22 10:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A beautiful fresh chypre that smells like summer. It is overpriced given that there are designer fragrances from this era (like CK One) that do not smell exactly the same but are similar enough for a much smaller price point. But that does not take away from how pretty and fresh this smells, with citrus fruits and white flowers and with oakmoss and green galbanum underneath. You'll smell great and feel fresh.<br />
<br />
UPDATE 8/10/22: I was wearing this today in a coffee shop, and the barista said, "You smell amazing! It's like a woody, earthy smell with just a bit of lemon." (I was in the drydown stage.) The more I wear this the more I love it--it's much more complex than I had initially thought above, and is worth the money, especially since CK One has almost no oakmoss anymore in its most recent formulations.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1570262"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1570262#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1538878" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1538878" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aholubek"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1237615"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="aholubek" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49144.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wanted by Night"title="Wanted by Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1538878ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1538878" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1237615">aholubek</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-07">04/07/22 14:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly smells like either a baby wipe (or even a diaper), I guess in that sense the fragrance succeeds if that's what it's going for. Not for me at all.<br />
<br />
2.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1538878"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1538878#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1516317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1516317" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cherry_Darling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1003821.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cherry_Darling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pascal-Morabito/Perle-Pour-Elle-47506.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47506.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Perle Pour Elle"title="Perle Pour Elle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1516317ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1516317" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1003821">Cherry_Darling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-04">03/04/22 05:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What in the men's locker-room is going on here? I was expecting a fluffy bright citrus, but this is definitely a masculinity bomb. I'd be tempted to blame the oakmoss and lily but those two are distinct in another way, this definitely has a "tonic sport" element to it. I'm not a huge fan of this style to be honest, herbal, fresh, but nothing you can't get in a 10 scent in any other male perfume from the drugstore. CK is much more fresh without the locker room aspect, although that doesn't last nearly as long as this one does. But given my inclinations that's not a good thing. Subtly soapy too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1516317"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1516317#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1515204" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1515204" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="koto_zbik"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1451891"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="koto_zbik" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1515204ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1515204" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); Unisex, for women who love citrus.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1515204"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1515204#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1487605" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; They. Are. The. Same.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1487605"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1487605#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1484066" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1484066"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1484066#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1462306" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1462306" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ilayda"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1333751"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1333751.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ilayda" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Martin-Margiela/Bubble-Bath-60105.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60105.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bubble Bath"title="Bubble Bath"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1462306ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1462306" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1333751">ilayda</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-12">12/12/21 17:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds me of the acqua di parma mediterraneo arancia di capri. Leans masculine, super lemony, this one lacks the sweetness arancia has but it works. its much more citrus and has a nice balance with the white florals which I really enjoy. The lemon and lime make this scent a little sour and makes my nose burn initially but the dry down is a much more aromatic green scent where the bergamot and oakmoss come through and it smells less like a cleaning product. This fragrence is too masculine for my taste so I layer it with more sugary citrus scents like stella tocca to balance it out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1462306"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1462306#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1422658" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1422658" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sabahstan3000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396771"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1396771.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sabahstan3000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Philosophy/Pure-Grace-4854.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4854.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pure Grace"title="Pure Grace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1422658ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1422658" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1396771">sabahstan3000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-05">10/05/21 09:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Had this recommended to me in their store, the initial sniff (through a mask, mind you) was cleaning-product fresh, which I enjoyed, but when I got a sample in the mail it was 100% too cologne-y for me. It's marketed for women and men, but it's a male cologne in my opinion. Far too musky and aftershave-y, which ruined any of the freshness I bought it for.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1422658"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1422658#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1405873" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1405873" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bobbybaldwinradio"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1137097"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bobbybaldwinradio" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1405873ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1405873" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1137097">bobbybaldwinradio</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-07">09/07/21 05:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my all time favorite summer scent. It is different,  classy, and clean. The performance is lacking but I find that simply spraying it on is something I look forward to so I reapply multiple times on the days that I west this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1405873"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1405873#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1399858" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1399858" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BuenaGirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/978279"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.978279.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BuenaGirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lolita-Lempicka/Illusions-Noires-Si-Lolita-Eau-de-Minuit-16183.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16183.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Illusions Noires Si Lolita Eau de Minuit"title="Illusions Noires Si Lolita Eau de Minuit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1399858ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1399858" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/978279">BuenaGirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-27">08/27/21 16:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wore this the other day from a dabber sample, full day's wear in what was our late summer heat (USA). I used the entire sample as I had to keep reapplying...for me, this would become a weak skin scent in about an hour. In looking through the other reviews, I was surprised to only find one mention of Bvlgari's Au The Vert - I find them very similar. They do have a number of key notes in common...I would say that Quercus does skew ever so slightly more masculine, but that is only experienced after I applied a spray of ATV to compare - if I had not done so I would have said Quercus was perfectly unisex. On me, I was most strongly struck with the cardamom and the sandalwood, overall effect coming across a touch soapy. A very nice scent, but the extremely poor longevity and my preference for ATV mean i enjoyed my sample and am content to leave it at that. If your chemistry lends to better longevity, I would say this is definitely worth sampling and could be a lovely addition to anyone's wardrobe for the warmer months.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1399858"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1399858#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1394371" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1394371" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DrNDJas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1063104"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1063104.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DrNDJas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Caron/L-Anarchiste-6380.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6380.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Anarchiste"title="L'Anarchiste"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1394371ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1394371" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1063104">DrNDJas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-18">08/18/21 07:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When initially sprayed, it seems like Quercus will be another 4711-type of 30-minute freshen-up you need to carry around in your man-purse if you want any practical use out of it at all. However, it has enduring tenacity on skin! What a pleasant surprise, though, remaining true to its cologne character, Quercus is never more than a pleasant reminder to one's proximate companions that a well-groomed gentleman is in their midst.  It can be found for low prices (for Penhaligon's) worth the cost if you are looking for a fine bitter lemon supported by floral greenery. There are some days that call for something like this, and this is just the thing for that!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1394371"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1394371#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1391101" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1391101" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MariaEleni"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324724"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1324724.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MariaEleni" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Opium-Eau-de-Parfum-2009-7399.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7399.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Opium Eau de Parfum 2009"title="Opium Eau de Parfum 2009"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1391101ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1391101" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1324724">MariaEleni</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-12">08/12/21 09:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like CK One by Calvin Klein but with a more lemony - sugary attitude. CK One though is way more long lasting and "metallic". Also, CK one is so much cheaper...<br />
<br />
I can associate this scent with a 45+ man, not for a younger lad in my opinion.<br />
<br />
A 100% male cologne. Too expensive for what it offers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1391101"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1391101#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1373817" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1373817" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="venussansfurs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1334239.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="venussansfurs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Feraud/Justine-23559.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23559.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Justine"title="Justine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1373817ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1373817" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334239">venussansfurs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-10">07/10/21 11:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Slightly herbal citrus with a lot of sillage and lasting power, moreso than many typical citrus fragrances.  Rather like a gin and tonic with lemon.  Doesn't remind me of CK One, which I find more masculine, synthetic and a bit dirty to my nose (at least the vintage version was).  Pricey, but the quality ingredients are worth it in my opinion for this type of scent, as it performs more like an EDT than a cologne.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1373817"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1373817#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1370273" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Looking for a fresh, out-of-the-shower-clean, well crafted, easy-to-wear, citrus fragrance? <br />
<br />
Your search is over.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1370273"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1370273#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1366958" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
