Strong for a cologne and works on a woman as well. I honestly can't decide if I like this or not. It's not my usual style and there is an edge that makes it harsher for me than usually beautifully blended Penhaligons.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1364721"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1364721#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1355596" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1355596" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blossomka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321912"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1321912.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blossomka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1355596ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1355596" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321912">blossomka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-06">06/06/21 12:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>7/10. Herbal citrus. Limonene. This is the scent they give to a really strong soap or cleaning fluid to make it smell nice. By association reminds me of something possibly toxic. Sweetens with floral notes and talcum powder after time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1355596"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1355596#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1348284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1348284" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="J350"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="J350" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1348284ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1348284" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201660">J350</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-23">05/23/21 18:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Call me basic but I am in love with this fragrance! From the first initial whiff to the dry down, all I can say is OUTSTANDING! This smells nothing like CK One. I personally think that CK One is more citrus and Quercus is more of a floral and woody scent. I get a strong hint of the jasmine, oakmoss and amber notes! <br />
<br />
I would say this is the perfect all year round perfume and is very much a unisex scent. Not too overpowering or offensive but very subtle with outstanding sillage and longevity. <br />
<br />
If the whole Penhaligons collection were people and I were to judge or comment on their personalities, I would say Quercus is the down to earth, modest and humble member of the family! <br />
<br />
This is definitely one of my favourite. It is however, a little on the pricey side. <br />
<br />
My overall rating: 8.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1348284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1348284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1336566" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1336566" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kiraagold"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1096823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1096823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kiraagold" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tauerville/Tuberose-Flash-41060.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41060.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tuberose Flash"title="Tuberose Flash"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1336566ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1336566" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1096823">kiraagold</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-03">05/03/21 07:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Quercus means oak, but I get lemon thyme.<br />
<br />
Opens with a bright herbal splash of citrus, that lasts through a burst of green florals. Settles to the skin in twenty minutes with some moss musk for another hour.<br />
<br />
Nice gardening vibes, but a bit pretty. This guy grows orchid varietals, rather than getting his hands in the dirt.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1336566"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1336566#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1321722" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1321722" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leighton3300"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307018"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1307018.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leighton3300" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kenzo/Kenzo-Jungle-L-Elephant-70.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kenzo Jungle L'Elephant"title="Kenzo Jungle L'Elephant"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1321722ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1321722" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1307018">Leighton3300</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-08">04/08/21 10:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just received the scent library from Penhaligons as I recently became more interested in expanding my knowledge and love of fragrances. This scent happened to be the first one from the library which I tried.<br />
<br />
First impressions: very fresh and light, if a lemon could ever be described as masculine this is it. I cannot single out many of the other notes (for the most part this is due to my untrained nose!) however there is something in the scent which stops this from being too similar to a cleaning product possibly the woody/mossy notes.<br />
<br />
Personally, I like to mix up my fragrances with some on the skin and a little on my clothing unfortunately the scent library came with bottles which have a dipstick rather than a spray. I would be interest in trying out the spray bottle in order to get a really good feel for the scent. As it currently stands, I do not think I would purchase a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1321722"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1321722#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1314247" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1314247" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tonkatsu335"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254643"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254643.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tonkatsu335" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Linda-Landenberg/A-Trembling-Rose-47015.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47015.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A Trembling Rose"title="A Trembling Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1314247ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1314247" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254643">tonkatsu335</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-26">03/26/21 04:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is unisex, but I think the cardamom makes it more masculine.<br />
If you don't like the smell that men's perfumes tend to have, this may not be for you.<br />
<br />
I think the scent is strong for a cologne.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1314247"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1314247#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1295850" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1295850" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lihsinhsu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273388"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lihsinhsu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1295850ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1295850" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1273388">lihsinhsu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-02-20">02/20/21 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like the scent but I would prefer to have it as a home fragrance like a diffuser or home spray or even a car scent. It smells a little too soapy and clean as a fragrance for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1295850"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1295850#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1283222" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1283222" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tulpan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1110821"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tulpan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rihanna/Reb-l-Fleur-10554.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10554.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reb'l Fleur"title="Reb'l Fleur"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1283222ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1283222" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1110821">Tulpan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-28">01/28/21 10:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strong citrus smell - comparisons with CK one are spot on. It's unisex leaning towards feminine, as it also has a white floral lotiony vibe. Although initially it smells citrusy/aromatic and quite maculine, it does soften down nicely. A summertime scent, that can be applied liberally</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1283222"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1283222#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1275062" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1275062" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ginandrice"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1246357.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ginandrice" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aesop/Hwyl-46895.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46895.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hwyl"title="Hwyl"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1275062ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1275062" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1246357">ginandrice</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-12">01/12/21 21:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The citrus opening here is round and sweet; more cheerful and relaxed than brisk and energetic.<br />
<br />
What follows is a fragrance that smells soft, musky, sweet, and clean. Like cool, clear nectar water on a warm spring day. Its what I think of as a wedding-guest fragrance: a fragrance you wear to add to the general pleasure of a gathering, without actually attracting any attention to yourself personally.   <br />
<br />
Leans very slightly masculine, but the way the white florals mix with the oakmoss and galbanum actually gives Quercus a subtly perfume-pretty element as well, making it almost as feminine as it is masculine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1275062"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1275062#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1252420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1252420" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MaquiLab"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254834.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MaquiLab" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1252420ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1252420" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254834">MaquiLab</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-24">11/24/20 02:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not your regular fresh scent, that's for sure! Opens up crisp and bright like a summer morning. The next thing you know is that you've just opened the closet where you keep the clean linen. Next up is the dreamy mix of moss and amber. Quercus is basically what I'd imagine a stay in a fine hotel somewhere in the UK is like - clean bedsheets, fine toiletries and, as you open the door to the balcony in the morning, a whiff of the park's greenery.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1252420"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1252420#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1236229" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1236229" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jamcd"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257368"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1257368.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jamcd" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1236229ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1236229" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257368">jamcd</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-13">10/13/20 11:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just gorgeous. Elegant. Like sinking into the crisp sheets of a five star hotel. Lemony and milky and soapy. I can see why they went for bright whites and royal yellows when they designed the bottle. Picks my mood right up. I can understand why people tend to like rather than love this fragrance: it's literally impossible for any of the notes to offend. But I tend to look for comfort and deliciousness in fragrances, rather than challenge and uniqueness, so this is amongst my favourite fragrances.<br />
<br />
On the CK One comparison, I kind of get it, but CK One is synthetic citrus to me. It hits me a bit brash and sharp. Quercus feels more blended and soft and cuddly, and I think is worth the massive price difference.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1236229"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1236229#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1220186" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1220186" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mr45"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250222"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1250222.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mr45" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zara/Zara-W-END-till-3-00-AM-39158.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39158.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Zara W/END till 3:00 AM"title="Zara W/END till 3:00 AM"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1220186ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1220186" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250222">Mr45</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-09-04">09/04/20 05:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its very nice. It is fresh and clean and has that 5 star hotel and classy airline vibe but no wow factor for me considering it is in the Penhaligon line up. Not on my top 10 Penhaligon fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1220186"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1220186#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1183864" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1183864" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gmr1967"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241164"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1241164.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gmr1967" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1183864ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1183864" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1241164">gmr1967</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-03">06/03/20 22:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening citrus fruits very present and stable. The flowery and slightly spicy heart comes later. Sandalwood and amber make it the whole base. They warm the perfume and soften it a little. I agree that it looks like CK One. A typical unisex fragrance. Highly recommended</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1183864"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1183864#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1180317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1180317" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AprilSea"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/3260"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.3260.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AprilSea" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Stephane-Humbert-Lucas-777/Khol-de-Bahrein-18311.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18311.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khl de Bahren"title="Khl de Bahren"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1180317ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1180317" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/3260">AprilSea</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-26">05/26/20 01:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Indeed it is similar with CK One, but mellowed with some white flowers (I'd say white lilac, no lily of the valley) and less lemon rind. <br />
Drydown is soft and milky/powdery, like a yogurt and lemon cake. Again, white lilac is the master of the show.<br />
<br />
A safe for office perfume of summer, uplifting and fresh - I needed such a happy perfume in this not so happy year.<br />
<br />
Not much sillage, though. [20 votes for enormous sillage?! dunno what were they thinking]</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="1180317"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=1180317#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1175712" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells like a luxurious citrus soap.<br />
Uplifting and cheerful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="997557"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=997557#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent995372" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc995372" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="echo4kilo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153785"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1153785.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="echo4kilo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/FZOTIC/Room-237-30364.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30364.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Room 237"title="Room 237"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma995372ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd995372" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1153785">echo4kilo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-10-27">10/27/18 19:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this from Lucky Scent and it immediately reminded me of CK One. My older brother had a bottle of CK One and I remember the smell all the way from 95. Quercus smells like a higher quality CK One, but is too close and I don't think I would ever wear it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="995372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=995372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent979540" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc979540" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GRAF"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/727556"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.727556.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GRAF" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/New-Haarlem-3258.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.3258.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="New Haarlem"title="New Haarlem"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma979540ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd979540" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/727556">GRAF</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-09-07">09/07/18 05:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Quercus is a classic citrusy-aromatic-floral scent with a vintage vibe and a soapy heart suitable for warm weather, totally safe and unisex. <br />
<br />
I get mainly slightly sour citruses, soapy florals and some greens.<br />
<br />
This is not a new smell for me so I'm not impressed.<br />
<br />
Performance is low-moderate overall. I do get the similarity with   CK One Calvin Klein only Querqus feels softer. Owning both is redundant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="979540"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=979540#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent977100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc977100" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="zesty_calco"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005584"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1005584.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="zesty_calco" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Geoffrey-Beene/Grey-Flannel-4608.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4608.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Grey Flannel"title="Grey Flannel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma977100ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd977100" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1005584">zesty_calco</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-08-30">08/30/18 16:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What's with me testing out fragrances that start with Q lately?! I get a vague citrus and wood; white florals, oakmoss, sandalwood and musk. Quercus is a little generic smelling and someone I know confirmed it smells like CK One. Kind of a body lotion vibe.<br />
<br />
Unisex leaning feminine. I think Q would work in any season. Not really sexy and just fine for work. I was surprised at the performance of this cologne as many Penhaligon's scents are pretty quiet. Lasted seven hours before becoming soft with nice sillage and projection. While Quercus isn't exactly groundbreaking I do like it. Reasonably priced, performance is there and it smells good. Quercus sounds like a cheeky insult you would call someone. A little like the word dingus. "Give this perfume a try ya quercus!"</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="977100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=977100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent957335" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc957335" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pinktojen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/711056"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="pinktojen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Vitriol-d-oeillet-12537.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12537.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vitriol dillet"title="Vitriol dillet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma957335ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd957335" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/711056">pinktojen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-06-30">06/30/18 10:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Quercus was one of my first Niche fragrances, I bought it at a time when I should have only been able to afford CK 1 but I plunged for the better of the 2. I had tried CK1 a million times but never bought the bottle, I really wanted to like it but it never captured me, and to this day I feel the same way. Quercus however caught me by surprise. I first tried it as toiletries at a boutique hotel I was staying in for work, I had no idea what the scent nor the brand was but it stuck with me, I stole a tone of soaps and toiletries that week haha. The vibrant citrus and sophistication just had me hooked. It just smells like a crisp linen shirt walking through a citrus grove. Its classy but casual, its not modern but its so incredibly clean.<br />
<br />
It had just come out and wasnt even available in the Us at the time. But the next year when I was in Vegas I found out there was a boutique that carried it I immediately marched my self over and bought quercus for me and Blenheim bouquet for my then boyfriend now husband. <br />
<br />
I feel like penhaligons is sometimes written off like MDCI is written off. Yes they may not be ground breaking scents and may seem over priced but sometimes the little twist each brans takes is what makes it loved and unique and not a mass CK1. I would have loved a little more sillage but quite honestly I just spray away with this one on a hot summer day. I enjoy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="957335"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=957335#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent947809" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/269434">scentdoctor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-01-19">01/19/18 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a blend of Burberry Weekend and Chanel platinum egoiste. very soapy and mature fragrance and can be wore all season and day time occasions. perfect for office or business setting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="902319"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=902319#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent902318" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc902318" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="scentdoctor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/269434"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.269434.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="scentdoctor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma902318ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd902318" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/269434">scentdoctor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-01-19">01/19/18 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a blend of Burberry Weekend and Chanel platinum egoiste. very soapy and mature fragrance and can be wore all season and day time occasions. perfect for office or business setting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="902318"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=902318#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent807027" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc807027" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vinyl_junky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="vinyl_junky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Geo-F-Trumper/GFT-5004.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5004.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="GFT"title="GFT"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma807027ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd807027" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1054736">vinyl_junky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-03-28">03/28/17 20:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As most reviews here have noted, this smells similar to CK One, with less longevity and sillage. <br />
<br />
I concur, but in my opinion Quercus is a more refined fragrance. CK One is loud - a tart citrus, in-your-face florals. Quercus is more restrained and well-rounded. You have the same citrus and floral notes, but they seem more natural and blend together better. <br />
<br />
If CK One was your signature scent in high school, Quercus is what you would be wearing to the office as an adult.<br />
<br />
Overall, a pleasant scent, I just wish longevity was better (I get around 2 hours).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="807027"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=807027#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent794125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc794125" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MountainviewK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1046551"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MountainviewK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Geo-F-Trumper/Curzon-Cologne-4998.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4998.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Curzon Cologne"title="Curzon Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma794125ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd794125" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1046551">MountainviewK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-02-18">02/18/17 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My first impression is that this is almost identical to CK1. Seems like the scent profile is essentially the same. Lots of citrus with a little musk and florals. Seems like most of the citrus is bergamot/lime with a bit of lemon. <br />
<br />
Since I like CK1 I like this one as well. Like most citrus scents (and like CK1) sillage and longevity are on the modest side.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="794125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=794125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent753220" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc753220" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="esteban747"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/442802"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.442802.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="esteban747" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/So-Blue-30496.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30496.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="So Blue"title="So Blue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma753220ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd753220" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/442802">esteban747</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-10-18">10/18/16 22:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's nice. A 90's fragrance all the way, citrus and unisex.<br />
Oakmoss and sandalwood are noticeable. The lemon is obvious at first, then is disappears completely.<br />
I'm not attracted to this type of fragrances anymore, I guess I already filled my dose during my teen years.<br />
Still, if you like citrus fresh fragrances, then go for it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="753220"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=753220#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent728831" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc728831" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ralopa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001004"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1001004.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ralopa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Vol-De-Nuit-Eau-De-Toilette-65154.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65154.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vol De Nuit Eau De Toilette"title="Vol De Nuit Eau De Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma728831ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd728831" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1001004">ralopa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-08-02">08/02/16 06:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Copycat, clone and dupe!<br />
<br />
As mentioned by guys here, it is a <b><i>CK One</i> rebottled</b>, and more accurately a <b>performance-weakened and over-priced version</b> of that.<br />
<br />
Some guys would try all means to argue that Quercus != CK One. Yes, yes, of course, as we can not find two pieces of leaves are the same on this planet. <b>I admit that there is a few differences b/w those two, but the act of blindly exaggerating the tiny distinction is absurd</b>.<br />
<br />
<b>Rating: <i>not necessary</i>.</b><br />
-----<br />
<i>You'd better ignore this one, and go grab a <b>CK One</b> instead!</i></p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="728831"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=728831#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent702351" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
