padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/87229">FlirtBoy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-05-04">05/04/16 07:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>CK One rebottled...but Quercus is more elegant and sophisticated...however, projection and lasting are moderate at best...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="702351"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=702351#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent684830" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc684830" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Shwets"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/159268"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.159268.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Shwets" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Eternity-257.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.257.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eternity"title="Eternity"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma684830ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd684830" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/159268">Shwets</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-03-08">03/08/16 02:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds me of a nicer version of Bvlgari Parfumee Au The Vert.<br />
Low sillage not my type of scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="684830"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=684830#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent636193" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc636193" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aleccsei"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/503248"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.503248.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aleccsei" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chance-Eau-Vive-30796.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30796.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chance Eau Vive"title="Chance Eau Vive"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma636193ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd636193" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/503248">Aleccsei</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-10-05">10/05/15 13:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A CLASSY AND MORE ELEGANT CK ONE<br />
_______________________________________________________<br />
<br />
I had the oportunity today to try this wonderful fragrance.<br />
<br />
It opens very very elegant with a hint of classy. In the beginning I couldn't identify it, but a few seconds later it didn't mater any more... I was definitely under Quercus' spell.<br />
<br />
Without a doubt there is a huge similarity with CK One - but don't let yourself be fooled too easily. To compare 'Quercus' with CK One is like the book 'The little Prince' by Antoine de Saint-Exupery. Young people and old people read it alike and love it. But the young people (CK One) like the adventures of the prince, while the older readers (the connoisseurs, Quercus) read between the lines and love the lecture for it's metaphores.<br />
<br />
Overall: To compare 'Quercus' to CK One is to compare teenagers, who lack experience, to real connoisseurs, who can write entire books on classy elegance! They are all human, but there is undoubtedly a lof of difference.<br />
<br />
Longetivity: - 3/10<br />
Sillage: - 3/10<br />
<br />
All in all: 7 out of 10 points (because it is manipulatingly charming).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="636193"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=636193#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent626395" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc626395" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DRA1974"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/898495"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="DRA1974" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Pal-Zileri/Collezione-Privata-Viaggio-d-Africa-8480.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8480.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Collezione Privata Viaggio d'Africa"title="Collezione Privata Viaggio d'Africa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma626395ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd626395" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/898495">DRA1974</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-09-02">09/02/15 08:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This isn't my favorite from the Penhaligon's range but oddly the one I reach for most often.<br />
<br />
I can't think of another fragrance that is more "appropriate" for all occasions during the brighter months.<br />
<br />
Daytime - Bright and fresh but not annoying<br />
<br />
Evening - The slight resinous notes gives it a bit of sweet warmth.<br />
<br />
Casual - Not shouty with a nice bit of woodiness<br />
<br />
Formal - The jasmine lends is some class.<br />
<br />
It really is just an all round great jack-of-all-trades frag.<br />
<br />
Not the cheapest, but since January when it fell under control of Puig seems to show up with discounts fairly regularly. If you like citrus (and I don't) it's probably safe as a blind buy if the price is right.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="626395"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=626395#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent613016" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc613016" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jamiljames"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/934469"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.934469.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jamiljames" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/The-Library-Collection-Opus-VI-14661.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14661.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Library Collection Opus VI"title="The Library Collection Opus VI"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma613016ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd613016" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/934469">Jamiljames</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-07-17">07/17/15 17:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Quercus for me is the most forgettable of all Penhaligon's fragrances I have tried. Its one that I neither like or dislike. I have tried to develop a love for it but have been unable to do so in nearly two years.<br />
Having said that I feel that is is probably the most universal fragrance Penhaligon's have. Anybody could wear this easily as the notes are inoffensive. Maybe in time I will fall in love with this. However I do not feel it is a fragrance I crave for and reach for easily.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="613016"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=613016#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent604161" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc604161" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="racb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/927134"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.927134.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="racb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Black-Orchid-Eau-de-Toilette-31969.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31969.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Orchid Eau de Toilette"title="Black Orchid Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma604161ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd604161" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/927134">racb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-06-15">06/15/15 11:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Light, spring like, fresh and citrusy.. It's a little too manly for me, but if I came across a guy wearing it I think it would give me a serious case  of the fanny gallops.<br />
<br />
Smart wool suit, crisp white shirt, five O' clock shadow and chiselled cheekbones. And Quercus. Sigh.<br />
<br />
Yummy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="604161"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=604161#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent578078" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
fragrence 10/10<br />
Longevity 7/10<br />
sillage 5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="578078"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=578078#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent554720" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc554720" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Buysblind"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/52178"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.52178.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Buysblind" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/H24-65147.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65147.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="H24"title="H24"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma554720ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd554720" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/52178">Buysblind</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-01-02">01/02/15 11:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This reminds me of so many other fragrances ranging from the inexpensive CK One and Chrome Legend all the way to the high priced Kobe, by Xerjoff.   It's a slightly watery fragrance equal parts citrus notes and white florals, specifically neroli and jasmine. It's decent and of relatively good quality, appropriate for the spring and summer.  It presents an impression that is clean and fresh.  There's not a ton of personality in Quercus, but it does its job well, and while I wouldn't be mad if someone gave this to me as a gift, I wouldn't seek it out either.  Performance is good. Thumbs up because there's nothing wrong with this offering from Penhaligon's, and on its own it's a solid fragrance, but once you start comparing it to others, it kind of gets lost in the mix.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="554720"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=554720#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent546324" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc546324" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Noirdesire"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/867346"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Noirdesire" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma546324ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd546324" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/867346">Noirdesire</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-12-04">12/04/14 11:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you like cheap "fresh" fragrances then this will appeal to you. I can't see why anyone would buy this for 85 when you can buy ck one for less than half the price. Not to mention that ck one lasts longer and is actually nicer, in my opinion, than Quercus.  Don't be fooled by the royal warrants!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="546324"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=546324#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent533216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc533216" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ChrisInBrooklyn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/290096"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.290096.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ChrisInBrooklyn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dana/Tabu-1104.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1104.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tabu"title="Tabu"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma533216ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd533216" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/290096">ChrisInBrooklyn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-10-18">10/18/14 18:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a small body lotion sample, and I *knew* it smelled so familiar, but I couldn't quite place it. And yes, It is verrry similar to CK One! It may actually be a bit more subtle, and significantly less synthetic. Ultimately I think it's a more aromatic and refined identical twin... I think CK One is pretty obnoxious, but don't mind Quercus at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="533216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=533216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent511994" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc511994" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Redbeard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/537021"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.537021.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Redbeard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma511994ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd511994" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/537021">Redbeard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-08-09">08/09/14 08:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The top is a lot like that of CK One, which in my opinion is pleasant, but with a bit more believable fruitiness. Unfortunately, as it gets sweeter, the fruit begins to overripen a bit. The sweetness surpasses CK One, or the fruity middle of Halston Unbound, but the fruit isn't as artificial as in Eternity. Quercus also has a bit less of CK One's assy faux leather base, which I begin to dislike after a while, but it's still enough for me to notice it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="511994"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=511994#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent435833" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc435833" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pinktojen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/711056"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="pinktojen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Serge-Lutens/Vitriol-d-oeillet-12537.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12537.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vitriol dillet"title="Vitriol dillet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma435833ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd435833" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/711056">pinktojen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-12-14">12/14/13 12:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>citrus, green, clean. Just reminds me of crisp white linens, and lightly starched white shirts with collar open.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="435833"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=435833#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent391358" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc391358" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Big Beak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/574352"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Big Beak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma391358ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd391358" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/574352">Big Beak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-07-31">07/31/13 04:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Because of the numerous comparisons to CK One, I pit Quercus against it. Everyone was right. They're very similar.<br />
<br />
The difference becomes larger by the 3.5 hour mark. Until now, CK One was easily beating Quercus with projection. Its notes also seemed sharper and more focused. Quercus felt soft and diffuse. Strangely, right after 3.5 hours, CK One just disappeared. Quercus is still there, but very close to my skin. This matchup reminds me of the fable where the tortoise beats the hare because it conserves it strength and determinedly walks on. Quercus is the tortoise here.<br />
<br />
This is tough. Quercus seems like a refined and softer (and weaker) CK One. It's also 2x as expensive: $1.60/mL v. $0.84/mL for CK One... I prefer CK One for its louder and sharper presenation, and cheaper price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="391358"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=391358#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent388739" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc388739" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IsaIsabella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/426860"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.426860.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="IsaIsabella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-s-Secret/Bombshell-10190.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10190.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bombshell"title="Bombshell"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma388739ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd388739" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/426860">IsaIsabella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2013-07-22">07/22/13 05:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spicy green chypre. Loud, unafraid to show the world its presence.<br />
For men only? Well, I love this scent and would probably want to acquire it in the future.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="388739"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=388739#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent386554" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Normally, I adore citrusy, woodsy, greens but this one ... this one went on like bad breath, ten minutes later it smelled like industrial bathroom soap and ten minutes after that it transformed into Jean Nat. Isn't it amazing how different these perfumes play out?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="386554"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=386554#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent366355" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Excellent for the sunny days and warm nights of the Mediterannean.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="4563"comment_id="357618"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Quercus-4563.html?ccid=357618#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent283868" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
